member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.GetRotation
member.summary: Gets the rotation that is currently being applied to the recorded video stream.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. You must specify a video stream.
Receives the image rotation, in degrees.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.SetCustomSink
member.summary: Sets a custom media sink for recording.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the media sink.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.SetOutputByteStream
member.summary: Specifies a byte stream that will receive the data for the recording.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of a byte stream. The byte stream must be writable.
A GUID that specifies the file container type. Possible values are documented in the MF_TRANSCODE_CONTAINERTYPE attribute.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.SetOutputFileName
member.summary: Specifies the name of the output file for the recording.
member.param: A null-terminated string that contains the URL of the output file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.SetRotation
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream to rotate. You must specify a video stream.
The amount to rotate the video, in degrees. Valid values are 0, 90, 180, and 270. The value zero restores the video to its original orientation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink.SetSampleCallback
member.summary: Sets a callback to receive the recording data for one stream.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. The index is returned in the pdwSinkStreamIndex parameter of the method.
A pointer to the interface. The caller must implement this interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureRecordSink
member.summary: Controls the recording sink. The recording sink creates compressed audio/video files or compressed audio/video streams.
